availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ruben H. Buckley (Henry County, Artist Painter)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, artist and painter. Kentucky native. Married to Evelyn Buckley. Father of Thomas C. Buckley, Lucinda Buckley, Martha Ann Buckley, Evelyn Buckley, Reuben Buckley. Artist and painter in Henry County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Newcastle, p.244.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Newcastle, p.2.
